content.text:
[cron:8b380d56-7314-4ba9-b4c4-ea11d3e5ca6f PR Review Patrol (High Frequency)] PR patrol for bills-bot.

Repo: /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot/

⚠️ CRITICAL RULE: Only check PRs authored by Bill (BillChirico) or by Pip Build / sub-agents. Do NOT check, fix, or address PRs from anyone else (other contributors, bots like coderabbitai, dependabot[bot], renovate[bot]) unless Bill has explicitly told you to.

Do this each run:
1) List open PRs in BillChirico/bills-bot.
2) Filter to ONLY Bill's PRs and Pip Build's PRs. Skip everything else.
3) For eligible PRs, count unresolved review threads.
4) If no unresolved threads on eligible PRs: respond exactly `NO_REPLY`.
5) If unresolved threads exist:
   - Spawn ONE sub-agent PER PR (parallel), never batch PRs together.
   - Use agentId `build`, model `anthropic/claude-opus-4-6`, thinking `high`.
   - Include full unresolved thread details (thread id, file path, line, issue summary).
   - Instruct spawned agents to read and follow CODING.md, fix all review comments (including nitpicks unless nonsensical/breaking/redundant), run tests/coverage, resolve threads.
   - Instruct spawned agents NOT to post PR summary comments unless Bill explicitly asks.
   - Have spawned agents report completion summary back to parent agent.
   - After spawning, send Bill a concise Discord DM status update:
     - channel: discord
     - target: user:191633014441115648
     - accountId: pip-build
     - include PR numbers and unresolved thread counts.
6) If any spawned run fails/stalls, note it in DM and respawn once.

Keep updates concise and action-oriented.
Current time: Tuesday, February 17th, 2026 — 11:04 AM (America/New_York)

content.thinking: Let me check open PRs in the bills-bot repo.

Only one open PR (#68) and it's authored by **AnExiledDev** — not Bill (BillChirico) and not Pip Build. Skipping per the critical rule.

NO_REPLY
